TopicTitle: Is there any good rebalance mods for the SLS parts

Articles.Content: While personally my preference for engine clusters would be a "Shuttle engine" part and fancy cluster adaptors, I would like to see mods that bring the ISP/TWR curve of the new SLS parts in line with the others. (and perhaps fix the rocomax 48 and rocomax 55 while they're at it.)
SLS looks like its made as a compilation of other mods, could you be more specific which mod? Link?

He means the stock NASA parts.

And as I've said in another thread, I should push something in the likes later today or this weekend.

Why dont you just edit the parts file, to give you the desired ISP and thrust? Edit: If you not sure how to, I can do it for you, but I dont know what exact numbers would be considered balanced.

Edited April 4, 2014 by Dgr

Why dont you just edit the parts file, to give you the desired ISP and thrust? Edit: If you not sure how to, I can do it for you, but I dont know what exact numbers would be considered balanced.

That's kinda the point, but everyone having their individual values just breaks the whole sharing thing yknow.

Ok, If you like I can edit a file and post it? I dont know where to start with making 'a mod' but I can code stuff easily enough. Saying that, I dont want to get in any trouble, what is squads stance on editing KSP files?

Edited April 4, 2014 by Dgr
